Package it.polimi.ingsw.gameLogic.model.match.player

Interface Adder

All Known Implementing Classes:
Player
public interface Adder
Interface used for limiting access to player methods It contains methods for adding resources or faith points

  • Method Details

    • addFaithPoints

      boolean addFaithPoints​(int quantity) throws LastRoundException
      This method increments player's faithPoints.
      Parameters:
      quantity - the quantity of faith points.
      Returns:
      a boolean
      Throws:
      LastRoundException - if the player has reached the end of the path.

      This method adds resource to the strong box.
      Parameters:

      Returns:
      a boolean
